subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With Kobe Bryant out with a fractured kneecap, the overmatched Lakers lost to the Heat as LeBron James, Chris Bosh and Dwyane Wade made enough plays when they needed to.
snippet: With Kobe Bryant out with a fractured kneecap, the overmatched Lakers lost to the Heat as LeBron James, Chris Bosh and Dwyane Wade made enough plays when they needed to.
